Translations.Text: Ni$ Nexleq amdan si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Nexleq loenn, iu$ leal, si tmes n ccili
Mi Inna Mass ik, i lmalayek: "Nek Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Mi t Mesle$, u Uuuve$ as si ooue iW, ersemt $uoes, knumt
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis, iugi ad yili ar wid iknan
Inna: "a yIblis, acu ik iu$en, ur telliv ar wid iknan
Inna: "ur kennu$ i umdan, i Txelqev si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Inna: "effe$ segs! Aql ak, ihi, d imenfi
Ih, fellak ddell alamma d ass uqeiii
Inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi alamma d ass n tnekra nnsen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Imi yi Terriv d a$ewway, war ccekk, ad asen cebbee$ ddunit, a ten $ewwu$, akken ma llan
Kkes ed imdanen iK izedganen garasen
War ccekk, ur tesaiv adabu $ef imdanen iW, siwa wid i k ivefoen seg imjaeen
Loahennama, s tidep, d ppaaud nnsen akw
D m ua tebbura; ar yal tabburt, s urbaa ines
